item.title: My topics for Data Science Master Students
item.description: Here are the topics I propose to Data Science Master students for their final project this semester (actually it is only four months). I chose mainly DBPedia/Wikipedia as the common dataset to all these projects, generally narrowing it down to a specific domain (environment, sport, jewelry) and a practical application (concept mining and visualization, question answering, natural language generation).
